0x488C86D2.name: SET_VEHICLE_HANDLING_FLOAT

params.name: vehicle
params.description: The vehicle to set data for.

params.name: class_
params.description: The handling class to set. Only "CHandlingData" is supported at this time.

params.name: fieldName
params.description: The field name to set. These match the keys in `handling.meta`.

0x488C86D2.description:
Sets a handling override for a specific vehicle. Certain handling flags can only be set globally using `SET_HANDLING_FLOAT`, this might require some experimentation.
Example: `SetVehicleHandlingFloat(vehicle, 'CHandlingData', 'fSteeringLock', 360.0)`
